Documentation.name: UML Profile for XSD Schema
Documentation.notes: This profile defines a set of stereotypes and tagged values for defining XSD Schemas

Stereotype.name: XSDschema
Stereotype.notes: Root element of XSD Schema. Contains all the definitions for a particular namespace. All the package contents or component classes are placed within the one schema

Tag.name: targetNamespace
Tag.description: URI to unique target namespace

Tag.name: targetNamespacePrefix
Tag.description: Prefix associated with namespace

Tag.name: defaultNamespace
Tag.description: Specifies the default namespace attribute in the schema element

Tag.name: version
Tag.description: Schema version

Tag.name: elementFormDefault
Tag.description: Global default specifying whether instance elements require namespace prefix

Tag.name: attributeFormDefault
Tag.description: Global default specifying whether instance attributes require namespace prefix

Tag.name: modelGroup
Tag.description: Default model group used when generating complexType definitions for this Schema

Tag.name: memberNames
Tag.description: Determines whether the UML attribute and role names are qualified by the UML class name

Tag.name: anonymousType
Tag.description: Specifies whether the class type is anonymous for attributes

Tag.name: anonymousRole
Tag.description: Specifies if the role name is included in the element declaration for the UML attribute

Tag.name: elementDerivation
Tag.description: Determines whether derived complexType definitions will be used or copy down inheritance

Stereotype.name: XSDcomplexType
Stereotype.notes: ComplexType definition generated in XML Schema

Tag.name: mixed
Tag.description: Determines whether this element may contain mixed element and character content. Refer to the W3C XML Schema recommendation

Tag.name: modelGroup
Tag.description: Overrides the package-level default model group

Tag.name: memberNames
Tag.description: Overrides the package-level default for naming complexType definitions

Stereotype.name: XSDsimpleType
Stereotype.notes: Define a new XML Schema Simple Type

Tag.name: derivation
Tag.description: Defines derivation type

Tag.name: pattern
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema Datatypes specification

Tag.name: length
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema Datatypes specification

Tag.name: minLength
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema Datatypes specification

Tag.name: maxLength
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema Datatypes specification

Constraint.name: No attributes or associations
Constraint.description: This UML class may not have any attributes or associations originating from it.

Constraint.name: Parent must be simpleType
Constraint.description: If a superclass is specified, it must also be a SimpleType

Stereotype.name: enumeration
Stereotype.notes: Generates a SimpleType with enumeration facets in XML Schema

Tag.name: default
Tag.description: Optional value to specify default from list

Constraint.name: Attributes defined which include Datatype Specifications will be ignored

Stereotype.name: XSDsequence
Stereotype.notes: Represents a Sequence model group contained within a higher level model group of a complexType

Constraint.name: Classes specified with this stereotype must be the destination of unidirectional associations in the UML model

Stereotype.name: XSDchoice
Stereotype.notes: Elements marked with this stereotype represent a Choice model group conatined within a complexType definition

Constraint.name: Classes specified with this stereotype must be the destination of unidirectional associations in the UML model

Stereotype.name: XSDany
Stereotype.notes: The stereotyped class or attribute will be relaced by an 'any' or 'anyAttribute' element. The tagged values are copied into the corresponding attributes of the generated element

Tag.name: namespace
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema specification

Tag.name: processContents
Tag.description: As defined in XML Schema sepecification

Stereotype.name: XSDattribute
Stereotype.notes: Assigned to UML attribute or association end. Indicates item is to be generated as an attribute within complexType and not as an element

Tag.name: form
Tag.description: Overrides the attributeFormDefault for this schema

Tag.name: use
Tag.description: As defined by XML Schema specification

Tag.name: default
Tag.description: As defined in XML Schema sepecification

Tag.name: fixed
Tag.description: As defined in XML Schema sepecification

Constraint.name: May not refer to a class specification

Stereotype.name: XSDelement
Stereotype.notes: Assigned to UML attribute or association end. Indicates item is to be generated as element within complexType and not as attribute

Tag.name: form
Tag.description: Overrides the elementFormDefault for this schema

Tag.name: position
Tag.description: If assigned, indicates position in the sequence model group

Tag.name: anonymousType
Tag.description: The class type will be anonymous for XML documents generated by the schema

Tag.name: anonymousRole
Tag.description: The class type will be directly embedded within the complexType definition. Omit attribute or role type wrapper

Stereotype.name: XSDrestriction
Stereotype.notes: Marks a UML Generalization as being a restriction of the superclass, overriding the default behaviour of the extension. Child will be generated as a complexType with restriction child element

Constraint.name: Parent and Child must be UML classes
